turn prev assignment rmd into pasias one

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
filename <- "handspan.Rmd"
```

```{r}
v <- readLines(filename)
v %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\\\question", "# xxx title here\n\n") %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\\\endnote", "xxx tufte margin note") %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\\\bP", "") %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\\\eP", "") %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\\\p", "(a)") %>% 
  writeLines("xxx.Rmd")
```
